mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by id) as rownumber , id, releid, zhaiquanyinhang, daikuanyue, daikuanfangshi, CONVERT(char(10),jiekuanriqi,21) AS jiekuanriqi, CONVERT(char(10),daoqiriqi,21) AS daoqiriqi, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime from Tb_product_czd_qtdkqk )t where rownumber > = #{offset} and rownumber < = #{pageSize}+#{offset}

select count(*) from ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(order by id) as rownumber , id, releid, zhaiquanyinhang, daikuanyue, daikuanfangshi, CONVERT(char(10),jiekuanriqi,21) AS jiekuanriqi, CONVERT(char(10),daoqiriqi,21) AS daoqiriqi, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime from Tb_product_czd_qtdkqk )t

SELECT id, releid, zhaiquanyinhang, daikuanyue, daikuanfangshi, CONVERT(char(10),jiekuanriqi,21) AS jiekuanriqi, CONVERT(char(10),daoqiriqi,21) AS daoqiriqi, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime from Tb_product_czd_qtdkqk t where 1=1
and t.id=#{id}

SELECT id, releid, zhaiquanyinhang, daikuanyue, daikuanfangshi, CONVERT(char(10),jiekuanriqi,21) AS jiekuanriqi, CONVERT(char(10),daoqiriqi,21) AS daoqiriqi, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime from Tb_product_czd_qtdkqk t where 1=1
and t.id=#{id}

SELECT id, releid, zhaiquanyinhang, daikuanyue, daikuanfangshi, CONVERT(char(10),jiekuanriqi,21) AS jiekuanriqi, CONVERT(char(10),daoqiriqi,21) AS daoqiriqi, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime from Tb_product_czd_qtdkqk t where 1=1 and t.releid=#{releid}
mapper.insert:
insert into Tb_product_czd_qtdkqk (
releid, zhaiquanyinhang, daikuanyue, daikuanfangshi, jiekuanriqi, daoqiriqi, lurushijian, inputuser, lastchgtime ) values (
#{releid}, #{zhaiquanyinhang}, #{daikuanyue}, #{daikuanfangshi}, #{jiekuanriqi}, #{daoqiriqi}, getdate(), #{inputuser}, getdate() )
mapper.update:
update Tb_product_czd_qtdkqk set
zhaiquanyinhang=#{zhaiquanyinhang},
daikuanyue=#{daikuanyue},
daikuanfangshi=#{daikuanfangshi},
jiekuanriqi=#{jiekuanriqi},
daoqiriqi=#{daoqiriqi},
lurushijian=#{lurushijian},
inputuser=#{inputuser},
¡¡ lastchgtime=getdate()
where id=#{id} and releid=#{releid}
